dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
3 bar scales on map given in "Mate des tempels", "Cude stadien", and "Nieuwe stadien".
Includes index: Verklaringe der cyfer getale.
Shows topography, vegetation, drainage, places of historical interest.
Feautures illustrations of structures, people, and angels throughout.

9 pictorial vignettes surrounding map: D'arke des verbonds -- De tempel Salomons -- De tafel der toon brooden -- De goude kandelaeren -- De hooge priester -- De tabernakel -- T' autaer des brant offers -- De coningh Salomon -- 'T reuck altaer.
